[![](https://www.gomach5.com/assets/images/logo.png)](http://www.gomach5.com)

Hello Everyone! Go Mach 5 is entering the market with awesome offerings for those at LET. We are a small, privately funded company founded by people who care. Go Mach 5, LLC is a brand that has been under planning for some time and has finally come to fruition in early 2015.

We are hosted with Psychz, and fully own all our hardware.

**Features**   
- FREE 20Gbps Mitigation  
- Tier 1 Bandwidth Providers including CT, CN2, CU  
- 1 Gbps port  
- /29 IPv4 (5 Usable) - /64 IPv6 (Upon request)  
- Free Hardware Replacement  
- KVMoIP on demand  

**Location:** Los Angeles

Dual L5420 (2x4 cores, 2.5Ghz, 12MB cache)  
16 GB RAM  
500 GB SATA 7200  
/29 IPv4 (DDoS Protected!)  
5 TB Bandwidth @ 1 Gbps   
<del>$49/month</del>$44/month with coupon!  
[Order Here](https://manage.gomach5.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1)

**LIMITED COUPON:** LEB - $5.00 off recurring!

Questions?
We will be answering questions through this thread or at sales@gomach5.com. Existing clients should use proper support channels as needed. All sales questions will be responded to within 24 hours. 

Need SSD? Need a bigger disk? We can do deals! Need something cheaper? Just contact us for a quote/deal on any configuration and we'll work something out! 

Thank you!
